title: Need help?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

Contact Us

# Need help?

#### Choose which channel best suits your needs:

![Browse the Help Center](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25GFVT2XDJ0QFHN2X7TJ8)

## [Browse the Help Center ![Link Image](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25DE8EV2CD2717N60G2P8)](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us)

Find relevant articles or ask for more help

[![Chat with Gigi](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25H2C57HRDAJ13490KW8G)](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/p/contact-us?chatbot-open=yes)

## [Chat with Gigi ![Link Image](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25DE8EV2CD2717N60G2P8)](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/p/contact-us\#)

Get instant information from Gigi or connect with a support agent

[![Call our hotline](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25EDWA7D8N7843MNRSBXJ)](tel:2882)

## Call our Hotline

Our hotline is available daily from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., with 24/7 assistance for urgent security concerns like scams, fraud, lost or stolen phones, and unauthorized transactions. This dedicated service is here to help keep your account and funds secure.

- • Globe and TM (toll-free) - Call 2882
- • Other networks\* - Call (02) 7213-9999
- \*Toll charges may apply

![Additional Image](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25NXF16XD7ST54A9D3R9M)

![Contact Us Image](https://help.gcash.com/hc/theming_assets/01J2X25NDV95DKG80SZQFCPHG2)
